00022 /**
00023  * @file   CelReader.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 09:11:45 2005

00027  * @brief Class for reading cel files and passing the data to memory
00028  * representation and analysis objects.
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef _CELREADER_H_
00032 #define _CELREADER_H_
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/CelListener.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/IdxGroup.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/IntensityReader.h"
00038 //
00039 #include "util/Err.h"
00040 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00041 //
00042 #include <vector>
00043 //
00044 
00045 /**
00046  *  Class for reading cel files and passing the data to memory
00047  * representation and analysis objects.
00048  */
00049 class CelReader : public IntensityReader {
00050 
00051 public:
00052 
00053   CelReader() : m_Size(0) {}
00054 
00055   /** 
00056    * @brief Do the heavy lifting of reading data from the cel files
00057    * and passing to all the streams and intensity marts.
00058    * @return true on success or false on error.
00059    */
00060   bool readFiles();
00061 
00062   /**
00063    * @brief Register a cel listener to see the cel file when it is
00064    * read
00065    */
00066   void registerCelListener(CelListener *reader) {
00067     m_CelListeners.push_back(reader);
00068   }
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * @brief keep track how CEL channels are grouped
00072    *
00073    * @param cel_channels - lookup object that will be populated when
00074    * CELs are read
00075    */
00076   void setCelChannels(IdxGroup* cel_channels) {
00077     m_CelChannels = *cel_channels;
00078   }
00079 
00080   inline double GetSaturationValue (int idx)
00081   {
00082           if (idx < 0 || idx >= m_Saturation.size ())
00083                   return -1;
00084 
00085           return m_Saturation[idx];
00086   }
00087 
00088 private:
00089 
00090   /// Vector of CelListeners to pass the cel file to
00091   std::vector<CelListener *> m_CelListeners;
00092   /// Number of features in the cel file
00093   int m_Size;
00094   /// object to track multi-CEL channels
00095   IdxGroup m_CelChannels;
00096 
00097 };
00098 
00099 #endif /* _CELREADER_H_ */
